Articles.Content:
Yop !

So , this is the Raptor family for KSP 1.0.4 ! Included 3 Raptors : Raptor R , Raptor Mini & Raptor Micro .

R & Mini are [stock] Micro got some [Tweakscale] parts .

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

Troops Capacity are :

[Raptor R](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1775&authkey=!AMq1KZ2T7iBaigs&ithint=file%2Ccraft) : 18 Kerbals , Electric , 402 Parts

[Raptor Mini](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1767&authkey=!ACg83EbZLymW-Es&ithint=file%2Ccraft) : 7 Kerbals , Diesel , 229 Parts

[Raptor Micro](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1774&authkey=!AAj5w2K2A7gfUPw&ithint=file%2Ccraft) : 5 Kerbals , Diesel , 163 Parts
